verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If that same Spirit
That raised Christ from the dead
Dwell in you, dwell in you;
If that same spirit
That raised Christ from the dead
Dwell in you, dwell in you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It shall quicken your mortal body
If that Spirit dwell in you;
It shall quicken your mortal body
If that Spirit dwell in you.
